MCTS, S=
SGB, PMP, PMI-SP<sai.prasad.b@...> wrote:
> Hi -
>
> I am using param=
eterized test runner that allows me inject different sets of
> data (from t=
he @Parameters feeder method) to the argument constructor of the
> test cas=
e.
>
> Though this is pretty good approach of calling the same test method =
with
> different data sets, I find it difficult when the test case has mult=
iple
> @Test methods and each test method needs a different data set to ass=
ert on.
>
> I am currently solving this by grouping the @Test methods that =
require the
> same data sets in a test case and moving the other @Test meth=
ods to
> different test case.
>
> Am i right?
> Sai
